about_the_game:
You don't have a friend near you right now and you want to play against someone?

Doesn't anyone have time to play "find the picture pairs" with you? Then try your luck against a funny intelligent AI cat who will compete against you in our unique “Find the Picture Pairs” game!


A great educational game for children ages 1 to 10! Perfect when there's no friend around to play with.
The artificial intelligence cat animal of this unique picture pair finding game enables entertaining gaming sessions with a high fun factor.


The game contains many funny picture motifs, but also learning cards, such as math cards or cards with which children can learn to count or train logical thinking.

The level of difficulty and the intelligence of the opponent cat can be freely selected, which makes the thinking card game perfect for children aged 1 to 10!

This game can be played completely without any language skills. Each action is understandable only through the pictures and illustrations, making it the perfect game for children in any country in the world.


Your McPeppergames team

  • Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
